entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:38 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 9:49 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSE 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late this evening. Wet snow over northern sections late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
